The original post appeared on April 1: 2020, on a Facebook page called "My Crazy World of Memes" and featured a 1-800 number to check on the status of stimulus payments.
Copycat versions of the post emerged: which were not clearly shared as jokes, leading to confusion among users.
The alternate 1: 800 numbers provided in some posts were not affiliated with the US government and instead offered lewd offers of phone sex.
The IRS has established a website and a: Get My Payment" to provide verified information and allow individuals to check the status of their stimulus payments.
